channel.title: It Happened in Hollywood on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Spinal Tap’ Director Rob Reiner on Controversial Sabrina Carpenter Album Cover: “It’s Life Imitating Art”
item.description: The helmer, whose sequel mockumentary opens tomorrow, dropped by The Hollywood Reporter’s ‘It Happened in Hollywood’ podcast.

item.title: ‘Spinal Tap’ Director Rob Reiner on Controversial Sabrina Carpenter Album Cover: “It’s Life Imitating Art”
item.description: The helmer, whose sequel mockumentary opens tomorrow, dropped by The Hollywood Reporter’s ‘It Happened in Hollywood’ podcast.

item.title: Cult Favorite Charlie Kaufman Surfaces on THR’s ‘It Happened in Hollywood’ Podcast
item.description: The beloved screenwriter and director revisited his 2008 directorial debut, ‘Synecdoche, New York.’
